Name: (P52) IMU Realign
checklistText:
(P52/P54) IMU Realign


		CMC - on (req)
		ISS - on & orient known (req)
		SCS - on (desired)


Panel 7:
	LOGIC 2/3 PWR - on (up) (req if no SCS)
	Optics - on (req, P52)
	COAS - calib (req, P54)
	Att Cont (req)


	Tot Att Disp (req)


Panel 2, 140:
	
	1 Key V37E 52E/54E

		Poss PROG alarm

	2 FL V04 N06

		Option code		00001
		Option			0000X

		Accept	PRO
		Reject	Key V22E
			Load desired option

		a.	If 00001 sel, go to 5

	or	b.	If 00002 or 0004 sel, go to 3

	or	c.	If 00003 sel, go to 8

REMARKS:
	Options available are:
		00001 - Preferred
				P30/P40 burn direction at TIG
		00002 - Nominal
				Local Vertical at a specified GET time
		00003 - REFSMMAT
				Remove accumulated IMU gyro errors.
		00004 - Landing site
				Aligns IMU to a surface location.


	3 FL V06 N34
		GET align		00XXX. HRS
					000XX. MIN
					0XX.XX SEC

		Accept	PRO
			If option 2, go to 5
		Reject	Key V25E
			Load desired GET align

	4 FL V06 N89
		Lat (+N)		XX.XXX DEG
		Long/2 (+E)		XX.XXX DEG
		Alt			XXX.XX NM

		Accept	PRO
		Reject	Key V25E
			Load correct coordinates

	5 FL V06 N22
		R, P, Y			XXX.XX DEG

		Accept	PRO
		Reject	Desired att cont mode
			Mnvr SC
			Key V32E

		or	Key V37E XXE
			Exit P52/P54

	6 FL V50 N25
		00013 (coarse align or pulse torque)

		Coarse align
			PRO, go to 7

		Pulse torque
			ENTR

			V16 N20 (present gmbl angles)
				R, P, Y		XXX.XX DEG

				
		


			Go to 20

			(R50, Coarse Align Routine)

	7 Verify coarse align complete

Panel 2, 140:
	NO ATT lt - on, then out
	Mon ball motion


	8 FL V50 N25
		00015 (trgt acq)

		a. For CMC assist in sel
			Desired att cont mode
			Mnvr to acq trgt


			PRO



				Poss FL V05 N09
				 00405 (accept pair not
					avail)
				 Mnvr until suitable trgt
					acq
				 PRO, go to 9

			or	 Key V32E, recycle 8

	or	b. To bypass CMC sel
			ENTR


	9 FL V01 N70
		Trgt code		000XX

		Accept	If P52

Panel 122:
		OPT ZERO - OFF
		OPT MODE - as desired

Panel 2, 140:
		PRO

		If P54
			PRO	
			
			Poss OPR ERR
				Recycles disp	


		Reject	Key V21E
			Load desired code

		For P52
			If trgt code ≠ 00 &

Panel 122:
				OPT MODE - CMC, go to 11

			or OPT MODE - MAN, go to 12

			For P54
				If trgt code ≠ 00, go to 13


Panel 2, 140:
	10 FL V06 N88 (planet only)
		X, Y, Z			.XXXXX

		Accept	If P52
			PRO

Panel 122:
		If OPT MODE - MAN, go to 12

	
		If P54

Panel 2, 140:
			PRO, go to 13
	
		Reject	Key V25E
			Load desired data

		(R52, Auto Optics Positioning Routine)

	11 V06 N92 (desired opt angles)
		SA		XXX.XX DEG
		TA		XX.XXX DEG

			Poss FL V05 N09 (2 sec priority)
				00404 (TA >90°)

			a.	Desired att cont
				mode
				Mnvr to reduce TA

				PRO

		or 	b.	Key V34E
					FL V37
						Key XXE


		If TA >50° & <90°
			Desired att cont mode

			Mnvr to reduce TA

		When sighting mrks are desired

Panel 122:
		OPT MODE - MAN

		(R53, Sighting Mark Routine)

Panel 2, 140:
	12 FL V51 (please mrk)
		Ctr trgt in SXT

Panel 122:
		MARK (on trgt), go to 15

		(R56, Alternate LOS Sighting Mark Routine)

Panel 2, 140:
	13 FL V06 N95
		SA			XXX.XX DEG
		TA			XX.XXX DEG

		Accept	PRO
		Reject	Key V24E
			Load desired SA & TA

	
	14 FL V53 (please mrk)
		RHC - ctr trgt in COAS reticle

		ENTR

	15 FL V50 N25
		00016 (term marks)

		Accept	PRO

Panel 122:
		Reject	If P52, MARK REJ pb - push
			Return to 12

Panel 2, 140:
		If P54, ENTR
			Return to 14

	16 FL V01 N71
		Trgt code		000XX

		Accept	PRO



				Poss OPR ERR
					Recycles disp

		Reject	Key V21E
			Load trgt code

		If trgt code ≠ 00
			Return to 9 for trgt 2

	17 FL V06 N88 (planet only)
		X, Y, Z			.XXXXX

		Accept	PRO
		Reject	Key V25E
			Load desired data

		Return to 9 for trgt 2


		(R54, Sighting Data Display Routine)

Panel 2, 140:
	18 FL V06 N05
		Sighting angle diff	XXX.XX DEG

		Accept	PRO
		Reject	Key V32E, go to 20

			(R55, Gyro Torquing Routine)

	19 FL V06 N93 (Δ gyro angles)
		X, Y, Z			XX.XXX DEG





		Accept	PRO (gyros torqued)
		Reject	Key V32E, go to 20

		or	Key V37E 00E, go to 22

	20 FL V50 N25
		00014 (fine align check)

		Accept	PRO, return to 8

		Reject	ENTR

	21 FL V37
		Key XXE

	22 If P52
		Opt Pwr Down
